summary: This module implements utilities for combining speaker diarization with automatic speech recognition in an offline workflow. It includes helpers for format conversion, result handling, and a core class that orchestrates VAD, diarization, ASR decoding, optional timestamp refinement, and produces speaker‑attributed transcripts in JSON and CSV.
business_intent: Provide a turnkey solution for generating speaker‑labeled transcriptions from audio recordings, supporting use cases such as meeting summarization, call center analytics, and any application requiring accurate speaker turn identification alongside speech content.
